title: Magic Gifts
description: Dinner date after a hard workday should be heavenly. Of course, dates between the Beast Lord and Kate Daniels donâ€™t always go as planned. Undead run amok, heads are chopped off, lawyers are deployed with extreme prejudice, and drunk vikings call people out.Novella is after Magic Slays, same time as Andrea in Gunmetal Magic, both intersect.Note: This novella can be found at the end of the Kindle edition of Gunmetal Magic.
